스페이스 다이버즈 2에 오신것을 환영합니다.
곧 월클병이 도져 게임철학에 대한 강의가 시작될 예정입니다.
지금 오도봉고에 탑승하고 있는 아쎄이들은 창문을 깨고 탈출하십시오.

Funciona bastante bien en Steam Deck!
Bajando al mínimo la calidad de vídeo va más o menos a 30 FPS con algún bajón.
Si no eres muy tiquismiquis y es tu única manera de jugarlo en Deck, es muy buena opción.
Warhammer não decepciona! Que jogo meus amigos... pela honra e glória do nosso imperador!
No se si se sobre calienta mas mi nepe o mi CPU.

The game is Warhammer 40K through and through. Grim, Dark and gritty.

The story is good and introduces you to why Titus got turned into a Primaris well.
For the obvious culture war question: No, it is not "woke".

Combat is violent and satisfying. A similar experience to what I recently had with Batman Arkham Knight. It is challenging.
(Countering, dodging and learning patterns etc, but it is more simplified here).
When you play as Titus you FEEL like a Space Marine. The power of the melee attacks, ripping enemies limb from limb. The shaking footsteps where you can 'feel' the weight behind every step. The thunderous boom as so much armour, meat, bone and muscle hits the ground after jumping down a ledge.

Started the game on hardest difficulty, and it is very challenging. Still determining if it will be possible to finish playing solo with bots. Edit: Seems possible, but is very challenging. Would only suggest "Angel of death" difficulty for the most dedicated players.

Shooting is also satisfying, but can't be completely relied on, engaging in melee is nearly mandatory once swarms close in.

Visuals are very impressive and faithfully 40K.

Sounds are all great and when involved in fighting give you the feeling you are in a battle.
Music is dark and 100% fits 40K theme. The main theme when the game starts actually sent chills down my back. (Awe inspiring).

After a quick look, operations and Endless War mode will provide plenty of replay opportunity.
Edit: Operations is thoroughly enjoyable. Levelling up is fun and very satisfying to become more powerful with more perks, better weapons and the armour skins are beautiful. The artists REALLY put effort into them!

On technical and performance, the game is running beautifully. RTX 3060, I7-10700K, 32GB RAM, SSD, Windows 11. Ultra settings, native resolution @ 1080P with TAA gives 40-60 frames. Lowest frames I've experienced so far are 30 in graphically intensive portions. (Considering my hardware is not high end, the performance was surprising to me, it shows the game is well optimised in my opinion).

The game practically oozes all the effort and work the developers put into the game and definitely worth any 40K fan's attention.

Some are saying it has Epic. The game makes use of Epic online services. (Not an app, just core components that allow crossplay between Steam and Epic as well as the needed files for Easy Anti Cheat. No Epic account was required when I started the game and none created that I am aware of).

A couple of technical issues I can't figure out, sometimes voice lines are normal, then barely audible (with subtitles it isn't too much of a problem, but if playing without them you strain to hear them.)

The most glaring problem is that the so called anti-cheat is doing nothing to keep cheaters out from ruining the game for others. That alone is enough to spoil the entire experience in PVE and PVP.

Couldn't join a friend in campaign and still looking for a solution. (Will update review if I find one or find the cause). Edit: I was able to join friends today with a few retry attempts, but connecting isn't reliable and sometimes doesn't work. Edit #2: Connection much better. Regularly join with friends now and only disconnections now and then.

Edit: No crashes or glitches thus far with exception that sometimes a save seems to glitch out and you restart a checkpoint with lower ammo, different primary than the one you chose along the mission, meds and health than you had when you reached the checkpoint. (This happened to me on "Severance" mission when mobbing me. Unknown what exactly happens to cause the glitch.

My initial thoughts were that the game is an improvement in every conceivable way over the first one. It obviously looks better, has more combat mechanics, more equipment, additional gameplay modes. However the more I think about the game and try to engage with its mechanics the more frustrating it becomes. At this point in time I only recommend buying this on a sale of at least 30% if not more.

At this moment the game is significantly overpriced for what little it offers.
The campaign is short and looks extremely cool.
PvE has six linear maps in total, each is completed in about 25 minutes or less.
PvP I haven't played because despite there being an anti cheat there are plenty of cheaters anyway.
Congrats on wasting money on EAC.

The visuals are amazing. They are the best part of the game. I know the visuals and assets for the game were incredibly expensive (they look the part) and therefore there isn't that much content, but I wish the gameplay came first. But it truly looks absolutely amazing.

The gameplay, sadly, comes far behind the visuals. At the moment it can be downright painful at times.
I spent the majority of my time thus far in PvE (online coop). My problems with it are as follows:

Class lock in PvE feels awful. You cannot play with a full squad of tactical/devastator/assault. I'm not sure what came first, the idea for class lock and then they decided to make each character "unique" to compensate or whether it was the other way around. Anyway it doesn't feel good to be restricted in this way in a game that has so little content to do.
The voice lines attached to each character aren't even that hyperspecific to their class, they would be passable on other classes.

Enemies have mile long healthbars. Knowing the lore it makes sense to me (in particular for larger tyranid gribblies and Tsons) but with how its done in the game it makes combat feel like a chore at times. You just keep shooting your gun or wailing on an enemy with your melee weapon and its not having any noticeable effect other than vfx/sparks (which look nice).
The majoris+ enemies should have more flinch/stagger animations at least when getting shot.
I think its a miss to not add some sort of battle damage system where nids get their limbs hacked/blown off but keep coming at you. The Tsons could have ceramite, adamantium and engravings getting shorn off their armor from bolter fire.
In fact it would be cool if we could shoot off the guns off ranged enemies.

Just something that shows the player "this guy is taking damage", not just particle effects.
Small enemies have the beginning of this system, but it doesn't feel right.
Shooting a termagant for it to reset the 1st frame of the same "owie I'm hit" animation 6 times in a row makes me feel like my weapon is either a nerf gun or downright bugged.

Its extremely disappointing with how little damage melee weapons deal. The finishers and their animations are extremely cool, I wish there were more and changed with direction you approach an enemy, like in Doom 2016/eternal. I also wish I could decide whether my marine does a hand-to-hand finisher or uses his weapon to do it.
However taking several swings at a termagant/tzaangor with a thunder hammer only for it to keep fighting just feels bad.

The melee feels inconsistent in most situations. Parry and dodge sometimes just don't work, or possibly due to nearby enemies overlapping their attacks when close to you they force you to miss the parry and dodge window. Then you get stuck in the block animation (where at first you don't take damage) but you can't input any command, and then another comes in and keeps you stunlocked and makes you lose majority of your health.

The worst parts of melee is when you are in a crowd and get attacked by lots of small enemies - hormogants or tzaangors. Their attacks come out very fast and overlap and clip through each other, either forcing you to miss the parry window on the warrior/Tson and you block and then take damage, or you just whiff the parry and take damage anyway. Let me dodge/step out of a parry animation please.

Enemies have iframes on their dodges. It feels like you're being cheated out of what little damage you can put out.

The gunstrike is way too slow and I died multiple times while locked in the animation. Its generally a theme for how deaths happen in the game, you get stuck in some sort of animation/stagger you have no way of cancelling or getting out of and then you die.

The jump pack makes me very sad. In the campaign it worked just fine, but it is gutted in PvE.
Lets say you want to jump over a chasm or from one walkway to another, but they are separated by about 2 meters of empty space.
The game seems to draw a line from the base of your character and directly in front of a him. That line must be drawn over terrain you can walk on.
If that line encounters impassable terrain, such as a small safety barrier or a gap, in 90% of situations you can't jump over the barrier or that gap. So you see a distance you are certain you can jump over, you could walk to your target (so you know you should be able to jump there), but the game just doesn't let you. In addition, sometimes when the jump indicator (at the end of the line being drawn mentioned above) hits or collides with certain objects, the jump just won't activate. It just feels very janky and unsatisfying to use.

Now when you jump up, you can do a slam attack where the marine flies at high speed to the target on the ground.
You'd think the victim of that attack would get turned to paste after getting hit.
Nope. They just get staggered a bit.
In addition, during your slam attack you first hover midair "charging" the attack. This looks weird and should be removed, if anything the marine at the apex of the jump should slow down a bit, but not become stationary, and as gravity pulls him down he uses the jump pack to get more speed. Also during that little hover I get hit by melee attacks which shouldn't be able to reach me.

It feels incredibly unsatisfying, in particular with how long the cooldown is on the jump. With how little height you get from the jump I think it would be better if instead of a slam attack, it was a targeted charge where there is only 1 target (no AoE), but that target takes lots of damage and likely dies. That and also the marine hits the target with his weapon, not slams it into the ground. Also the jump pack should be the go to choice for tackling flying enemies (zoanthropes, levitating sorcerers), but there is no such option, You can either do a dash on the ground, jump from A to B, or jump and do a ground slam. There is a cutscene in the campaign that shows exactly how a jump pack should feel (it looks a bit OP there I'll admit, but it looks insanely fun) but having seen it and then trying the jump pack for yourself feels like you got cheated.

The ranged combat suffers from the same principal issue as melee - you just don't feel like you're doing any damage or that enemies are at all affected by taking multiple headshots in a row.
I think its most telling that the most fun to be had was using the the underslung grenade launcher or the sniper las fusil and two or three shotting majoris enemies. The melta is excellent at staggering hordes and clearing smaller enemies and leaving the large guys to take care of - honestly this should be a flamer (which for some reason is absent from PvE) and the melta should have a smaller blast but be the choice weapon to deal with heavy armour as in the lore.
When you have strong weapons which have direct impact like the three I mentioned, the ranged combat felt good. However, 90% of the guns do not have such an impact and therefore feel like trash.

Additionally, the amount of spread would be fine for a standard human, but how can an astartes have this much inaccuracy and spread? It makes no sense to me, in particular when all enemies are great at leading the player.

Its all so tiresome.

Что сказать, это отличнейший олдскульный шутан. Враваемся и разъёбываем! Старое-доброе ультранасилие в наличии, разрубание силовым мечом от головы до жопы в наличии, потный хардкор в наличии, свет Бога Императора в... сердцах!

Ну что же... Буду краток. Давно не испытывал таких эмоций от игры и чтобы хотел играть в ПВП И ПВЕ после прохождения. Всем ваховедам и тем кто хоть немного знаком со вселенной- РЕКОМЕНДУЮ однозначно и не только! Наши разработчики красавчики. Каждому бы пожал руку.

Space Marine 2 is a must-buy game that harkens back to the politics-free heyday of gaming. It is like taking a time machine back to the 2010s and going through all those beautifully made games during that era. It also shows how far AAA gaming has fallen. All publishers and development teams should take note and do better, focusing primarily on player experience over 'sending the message' and monetization. Saber Interactive should be very proud of what they have made.

If, like me, you are disappointed with the needless disrespect towards canon and established lore by Games Workshop lately, then you need not fear Space Marine 2. Space Marine 2 follows the story of Captain Titus in a way that respects what has been and does not cater to the tourists and nu-Warhammer fans destroying the hobby currently. Any true Warhammer fans can buy Space Marine 2 guilt-free.

The single-player campaign is long enough to provide a story that ties into the Era Indomitus and the previous story of the first Space Marine game. Playing it solo can be challenging, especially on higher difficulties, but I found it to be well worth playing and had very few issues with it even though I finished it on early patches.

Playing Operations solo is also likewise a very meaningful experience that you cannot replicate elsewhere. I am ecstatic that Saber Interactive is continuing to develop more missions for this mode. The mission where you kill the Bio-Titan is my new favourite. I have had a few drops when I played it, but otherwise, I have not had any major issues.

Multiplayer is fun, but I still think the Bulwark class is overpowered, and some balancing is necessary. It is not a mode I have played a ton, but I can report no major issues.

A huge bonus is that the usual suspects hate Space Marine 2 and its success:



Another bonus is that the CEO of Saber Interactive is incredibly based:



As is some of their dev team:



I give Space Marine 2 a very solid 9/10, only citing some minor technical issues in Operations mode. Space Marine 2 is my game of the year this year on Steam, and I highly encourage anybody to buy it. Whether this is your first or tenth Warhammer game, this is a worthy buy and entry into the grimdark universe of 40k. Well done to Saber Interactive.
People are cry babies, game runs great, ultrawide will come in the first season, game is fun as f*ck. If you like Warhammer 40k and like smashing sh*t apart then this is the game for you.

What is it to be a Space Marine?
- It is to be death!

What is it to be death?
- It is to be the destroyer, the end of all things.

What is it to end life?
- It is an honour, to be the executioners of the Emperor.

Why do we fight?
- To protect the Imperium and deliver mankind from the evil of the xenos, the mutant and the heretic!

What is the xenos?
- A blight to be purged!

What is the mutant?
- A cancer to be excised!

What is the heretic?
- A shame to be expunged!

What is the bolter, the flamer, the missile?
- The incarnation of destruction, by which we bring about the death of the Emperor's foes!

What is the armour, the helm and the shield?
- The embodiment of our faith, our determination given form.

Who is the primarch?
- Our father, our guide, our king!

Who is the Chapter Master?
- The primarch's regent, to whom we swore oaths, the voice of the Emperor in the mortal world.

What are our oaths?
- The steel that binds our lives to the Emperor.

What did we swear?
- Our lives are as nought in the vision of the Emperor, save that by them we shall destroy all foes.

What is the fate of all foes?
- To perish in the fire of battle and be cleansed from the galaxy.

Who will prevail against the darkness?
- The Ultramarines!

Who are the swords of the Emperor?
- The Ultramarines!

Who are the sons of Magragge?
- The Ultramarines!

For the Emperor and the primarch! Death! Bring death to our foes!

As a long-time fan of the Warhammer 40K universe and someone who enjoyed the original Space Marine, Space Marine 2 has completely blown me away!

From the moment I stepped into the boots of Captain Titus once again, I was hooked. The combat is absolutely brutal in all the best ways. Whether you're smashing through hordes of Tyranids with a chainsword or mowing them down with bolter fire, the action is fast, fluid, and incredibly satisfying. The melee and ranged combat balance feels perfect, and pulling off those savage executions never gets old.

The visuals are a massive leap forward compared to the first game. The environments are gritty and detailed, really capturing the grimdark essence of the 40K universe. Whether you’re fighting in ruined cityscapes or alien-infested hives, it all looks stunning and immersive.

One of the biggest highlights for me is the coop multiplayer. Playing with friends and unleashing the wrath of the Emperor as a team is an absolute blast. The teamwork and coordination required to survive against the swarms of enemies really elevates the experience, making it feel like you’re part of a true Space Marine squad.

Graphics 9/10
Gameplay 9/10
Performance 7/10
Both PVP and Operations are fun addition.

If you’re a fan of Warhammer 40K, third-person action games, or just love co-op gameplay, Space Marine 2 is a must-play. It’s everything you want from a sequel and then some. For the Emperor!

Przyjemna, sentymentalna wręcz podróż do ery PS360, kiedy to większość gier akcji ukierunkowanych na pojedynczego gracza była wolna od zbędnych udziwnień i tony rozpraszaczy. W takim właśnie duchu, w połączeniu ze współczesną oprawą, powstał Space Marine 2.

Już od pierwszych chwil w kampanii czuć, że gra wie, czym chce być i dokładnie to oferuje. Walka jest mięsista i miodna, a przy tym prosta lecz nie prostacka i sumarycznie jest satysfakcjonująca. Naszej uwagi nie rozprasza nawet jakikolwiek rozwój postaci, a i znajdźki są szczątkowe (audiologi, które zresztą łatwo przeoczyć).

Pozytywnych wrażeń dopełnia świetnie oddany, ciężki klimat Warhammera 40k i nieraz odczuwalnie monumentalna skala wydarzeń, której czuciu wydatnie pomagają też chmary przeciwników, składające się nieraz z setek osobników, które potrafią tworzyć „żywe wieże” na podobieństwo tych z World War Z.

Gameplayowo fani Gearsów poczują się tu jak w domu, bo za wyjątkiem chowania się za osłonami, dostaną wszystko, za co polubili serię od Microsoftu. Protagonista oraz inni kosmiczni marines to odpowiednie gigachady, choć może bardziej od testosteronu czuć tu ich fanatyzm.
Na minus SM2 z kolei wypada mniejsza różnorodność rozgrywki. Biegamy, strzelamy, siekamy bądź tłuczemy lub robimy uniki – tylko tyle, nie licząc dwóch dość krótkich momentów w których dostajemy jetpack umożliwiający chwilowe wzbijanie się w powietrze. Szkoda, aż prosiłoby się choćby o jakieś sekwencje celowniczkowe na pokładzie maszyn bojowych, których w trakcie opowieści widzimy cały wachlarz.

Strzelając i rąbiąc ku chwale Imperatora od razu czuć, że jesteśmy potężni. Mniejsi wrogowie eksplodują niczym worki z posoką, ci nieco więksi szybko uznają naszą wyższość dając się rozciąć na kawałki – mamy tu zresztą system egzekucji podobny do tego z nowożytnych Doomów - odpowiednio zmiękczony adwersarz łapie stuna i przez chwilę jest podatny na efektowny finisher, który odnawia nam coś na kształt pancerza czy może bardziej pola siłowego. Co ciekawe, to samo nie tyczy się paska zdrowia – tu jesteśmy uzależnieni od znajdowania apteczek, których jest dość niewiele.
8-10h, jakie należy poświęcić na ukończenie singla, przedłużyć można jeszcze misjami co-opowymi, na jakieś 30-45 minut każda. Są one mocno powiązane z wydarzeniami fabularnymi i, choć obecne są tam rozmaite unlocki, nie sprawiają wrażenia GAAS-owej wydmuszki. Jest jeszcze tryb PvP, ale o nim nie mam za dużo do powiedzenia. Szkoda jedynie, że na premierę zabrakło trybu hordy. Ma być dodany kiedyś tam

Ode mnie solidne 8/10 i polecajka, dla wszystkich, którym tęskno do efektownej akcji i mięsistego strzelania. Nawet bez znajomości uniwersum WH 40k można się tu bawić bez problemu (sam wiem tylko tyle, że są space marines, którzy mają boga-imperatora i walczą z herezją oraz chyba wszelkimi pozostałymi rasami uniwersum, . orkami czy tyranidami). Acz zaznaczyć trzeba, że Space Marine 2, podobnie zresztą jak część pierwsza, niczego ze świata przedstawionego nam nie tłumaczy, pozostawiając wszystko ewentualnie naszej ciekawości i… sam czuję się nawet zachęcony do zgłębienia lore.

战锤40K粉丝可以入，场面做的很好，过场cg也很震撼，很符合对战锤40K战斗场面的想象。
非战锤40K粉丝慎入，战斗其实一般，普通水准。不是无脑爽爽爽射射射的游戏，需要一定理解与操作。武器与职业之间的平衡不好，有的武器与职业过于弱势。
同时最主要的问题是目前的体量不太符合定价，PVE就5个主线战役与6个副本，后期刷刷刷有点无聊，重复性过高，PVP三个模式三张图。服务器问题还存在，但比开服前好了不少。
(以上是我在10月17日之前的评测）
*******************************************************************************************

This game is amazing..... Well it could be if it didnt have the issues it currently suffers.

My main gripes with this game are the connection Issues - Stuck at loading screens(joining friends or matches), Matchmaking not finding players. Just server connection altogether. I can play maybe one game then the matchmaking breaks for me and wont find anyone else then I inevitably lose connection to the server. This is HIGHLY annoying and one of many reasons that I cannot recommend getting/playing this game right now. I have had crashes multiple times (other friends had full PC crashes with a brand new PC) Mine was only the application that crashed. Also multiplayer party size being cut from 5 to 3 was a low blow and for what? Like WHY?

战斗设计有大问题。从最简单的数值到最底层战斗交互没一个做好的。制作组想结合近战远程和其他战斗手段，但是结果就是全部拉胯。
游戏里绝大多数战斗都是给一个大空地然后刷出大量远近复合的敌人，但是玩家角色的性能又不足以顶着远程火力清掉近战敌人或是反过来。相比高压的虫巢或者混沌大军，玩家孱弱的解场能力实在是不值一提，而空旷的场地设计和对远程攻击的无能为力甚至让玩家连拉扯都做不到，打的慢就是死。
弹反的手感非常奇怪，根据提示按键却不一定能完美弹反，整体判定突出一个神秘，幽默枪决更是硬控自己一秒。同时战斗中经常出现防御或闪避无法中断当前攻击动作的情况，也不知道是bug还是什么。而且就算这样，也经常出现精英敌人配合攻击，弹反之后的硬直里受到其他精英怪的攻击。
另外硬直机制也非常恶心，受击产生硬直会导致在面对多个敌人或是特定连招时会被压起身。
关卡中的补给少的可怜，我不知道行动模式高难度下从头到尾能不能每个人捡到4个医疗包：这差不多是完全回复一个角色血量所需的。
敌人的攻击方式也非常逆天，绝大多数远程精英都能硬顶着攻击换血，其中特别是脑虫最离谱。作为一个集buff，大范围远程攻击，飞行一体的敌人，居然有厚的离谱的血量，纯逆天。优先处理吧，血太多rush不掉，最后处理吧，它会buff其他敌人，并且会用高频率的攻击逼迫玩家闪避。
boss除了判定神秘之外其实问题相对来说比较小，除了主线里的强化脑虫boss有个瞬发aoe过于逆天之外别的大多数都还捏着鼻子能打。
总结就是和1代相比玩家的续航和控制手段弱了非常多，但是敌人不管是数量还是强度都提升了非常多。面对的敌人超过了玩家的性能战斗体验非常憋屈。
虽然我觉得暗潮也是个垃圾游戏，但是我认为saber应该去玩500小时暗潮再重新设计这游戏。
看看暗潮是怎么做的：
在复杂的环境中玩家有掩体和转角可以依靠并让敌人汇聚在同一处。近战敌人会遮挡远程敌人的枪线。玩家有强力的技能解场，有滑铲回避远程攻击。
关卡中有固定的医疗站点，固定数量的医疗箱和补给箱，以及随机散布的医疗针和弹药。不说管够，至少没这么抠门。
敌人设计可能是暗潮做的最好的地方，虽然曾经出现过因为数值导致逆天火雷哥或者机枪手，但总体性能大多在合理区间。
暗潮的boss相对不算太出彩，但是和星际战士2相比依然不逊色，至少没什么要靠无敌帧躲的逆天全屏aoe这种奇葩设计。
考虑到暗潮也不是首发就做成那个样子，我的评价是未来可期。目前不推荐任何人（除非你真的特别特别喜欢战锤40k这个ip并且对垃圾系统有着良好耐受性）在制作组进行大幅度修改前购买。

Après quelques dizaines d'heures je peux estimer le droit de donner un avis le plus objectif possible.

Oui le jeu est bon, très bon.

La campagne est belle, les environnements soignés et offre un bon moment divertissant avec des cotés épiques (la fin est monstrueuse) ... et un bon apprentissage des différentes armes et compétences. Bon c'est pas un scénario dans la subtilité mais c'est du warhammer, faut pas déconner, on est la pour bourriner ;)
Les missions en coop sont vraiment sympa, les cartes et les mécanismes sont bien différentes des unes aux autres et la difficulté est très intéressante. Evidemment avec des potes en vocal c'est bien plus agréable.
Point négatif cependant, 3 en coop c'est un peu léger ... ou alors ne pas avoir beaucoup de potes :D

Aucun avis en PvP je n'en fais pas.

En tout cas ca défoule beaucoup, ca fait transpirer aussi face aux vagues énormes d'ennemis et on passe un bon moment agréable et EPIQUE.

战役已通，合作在打，这游戏优点乏善可陈，但是有几个比较严重的问题，我们细说：
优点：
1.锤佬翘首期盼的具现化产物，如果你是锤佬，里面大多数要素都能知晓，目前也没有什么游戏能做到这么还原了。
2.不愧是僵尸世界大战的制作组，做敌人集群表现这方面真的有一套。
3.战斗表现，终结技的表现很不错，打击感反馈很爽。
缺点：
1.游戏鼓励近战，毕竟近战回盾，终结技无敌，但是反馈奖励实在太差，回盾就回那么一点，前期难度低的任务还好，后期远程敌人多起来，但凡你敢近战马上就把你打趴下，游戏也缺乏有效的AOE手段，除了飞天大锤，手榴弹和开技能，一旦被包围基本就是寄。什么，你说弹反和招架？满屏幕的蓝红圈，你招架哪个？且不说招架还有CD，还需要对准敌人，还要当心远距离黑枪的敌人，好在游戏体力是无限的，翻滚没有限制，但是这非常影响游戏的战斗体验，打着打着就变成翻滚人很是常见。
2.武器问题，说实话这游戏的武器简直少到令人发指，别误会，我说的是能用的武器，琳琅满目的爆弹枪，但是实际上就是弹匣，射速这类数值的平衡，所以基本上就是一堆射速，弹匣，射程参差不齐的爆弹枪，本质上都是滋水枪，威力低且滑稽。且不说你是一个阿斯塔特，后坐力和瞄准竟然这么离谱，稍微远一点那个散布就跟霰弹枪一样。好用的武器也就是热熔，等离子，狙这种杀伤大的武器，但是弹药少的让我怀疑自己到底是阿斯塔特还是星界军，游戏的补给也是一绝，一路上医疗包基本看不见，弹药补给补的少，还分散的广，角色治疗手段又匮乏，作为主力AOE武器的破片手榴弹只能带3个简直大开眼界，隔壁的披风蟑螂都能带4个，更别说披风蟑螂的军火库比你阿斯塔特丰富的多。
3.关卡设计和任务，如果你玩过僵尸世界大战，你会发现这本质上就是僵尸世界大战的任务模版，坚守，救援，杀敌突破，安置爆炸物，任务别说丰富了，用无聊来形容都未尝不可，本质上就是僵尸世界大战的那套刷刷刷，技能树，武器解锁等等，但是，其一，游戏前期角色实在太弱性能太差，挫败感实在太严重了，技能树的成长奖励也糟糕，基本上只有大后期才能体会神皇附体的爽感，其二，目前游戏的行动模式能刷的关卡就6个，敌人的种类也少，来回来去就那么几样，关卡重复度严重，导致内容乏善可陈，鼓噪无味。40K的世界观很大，只希望日后制作组可以及时的推出新内容，目前的这点内容可是完全不值200+的。
4.游戏抛开内容不谈，首先是作为一款24年的游戏，不支持HDR，不支持宽屏，这简直难以置信，具体原因到底是制作组的功底还是压根不想做我也不清楚，但实在不应该。至于网络则是这种PVE PVP游戏的老生常谈了，断连卡顿，队友鬼畜操作见怪不怪，这里不做过多评价。至于小蓝熊反作弊？这玩意除了恶心玩家自己，在反作弊这方面形同虚设，开一局PVP结果一进去满地的无敌盾佬，飞天神仙，基本没有打开第二次的欲望了。
总而言之，除非你是个忠诚异常的锤佬，否则我建议者200+还是别花了，中秋节临近，个人建议还是买个月饼礼盒孝敬长辈慰问朋友更好一点。

We do not know what our chances of survival are, so we fight as if they were zero. We do not know what we are facing, so we fight as if it was the dark gods themselves. No one will remember us now and we may never be buried beneath Titan, so we will build our own memorial here. The Chapter might lose us and the Imperium might never know we existed, but the Enemy — the Enemy will know. The Enemy will remember. We will hurt it so badly that it will never forget us until the stars burn out and the Emperor vanquishes it at the end of time. When Chaos is dying, its last thought will be of us. That is our memorial — carved into the heart of Chaos. We cannot lose, Grey Knights. We have already won.

To preface, my review was negative, due to patch 4.0 which introduced a bunch of changes a week ago at the time I am writing this.

Today we had another patch that reversed said changes, and after playing for a few hours, I can honestly say that Space Marine 2 is back in a good position again. This is of course subjective, but I am clearly not alone having this viewpoint.

In its current state SM2 is gory, engaging, testosteronie- filled fun. I usually stick to various RPG, and haven't really enjoyed a shooter (if you can even call it that) since Battlefield 1942.

I can't stop playing this though.

You have a campaign, which takes about 7 hour'ish to complete. While that might sound short, it is highly entertaining. The quality is top notch. At least I was having a blast blasting, hacking and swordchainsaw'ing my way through it.

Than you have the online part. As someone who is generally burned out of online games, this still has hooked me. You have PvE coop missions, called operations, where you and 2 fellow Space Marines clear out 1 of 7 maps. You can chose between 5 difficulties. The lowest one being very easy, the hardest one .. well.. hard.

I could probably write an essay about this game, but bottomline:
This is my years Baldurs Gate 3. Totally different genres, but both are game of the year content for me.

Also kudos to Sabre for listening to the community feedback. They reverted a highly unpopular patch in 1 week. They are also introducing public test servers. So this is apparently a company that listens.

Отзывы никто не читает , поэтому напишу рецепт моего любимого Сырного крем-супа с шампиньонами

Сыр сливочный - 120 г
Шампиньоны - 300 г
Сливки 20% - 100 мл
Картофель - 3-4 шт.
Лук репчатый - 1 шт.
Морковь - 1 шт.
Соль - по вкусу
Перец чёрный молотый - по вкусу
Чеснок сушёный молотый - 0,5 ч. ложки
Масло растительное - 2 ст. ложки
Зелень свежая (для подачи, по желанию) - по вкусу
Вода - 1,5 л

№1 Подготовить все необходимые продукты.
Картофель, лук и морковь очистить.

шаг №2
Картофель нарезать средними кусочками.

шаг №3
Морковь нарезать произвольными кусочками или натереть на крупной терке.

Сырный крем-суп с шампиньонами - шаг №4
Лук нарезать небольшими кусочками.

шаг №5
Шампиньоны нарезать средними кусочками.

шаг №6
В сковороде разогреть растительное масло, выложить нарезанные овощи и жарить 10 минут, периодически помешивая.

шаг №7
Переложить овощи в кастрюлю, влить 1,5 л теплой воды и варить на умеренном огне 25-30 минут.

шаг №8
Затем добавить в кастрюлю сливочный сыр.

шаг №9
Влить сливки, добавить соль, чёрный молотый перец и сушёный чеснок. Перемешать и варить суп еще 7-8 минут.

шаг №10
Взбить суп при помощи погружного блендера. Попробовать суп, отрегулировать вкус и подавать к столу.

шаг №11
Разлить сырный крем-суп с грибами по тарелкам, при желании украсить свежей зеленью. Подавать суп к столу можно с сухариками и отдельно поджаренными грибами.
Приятного аппетита!

游戏的氛围渲染和剧情描述的非常到位……主角的刻画入木三分……每一帧场景都极尽的体现了行星战争的残酷，和帝国星界军的无畏，以及极限战士的勇往无前……这是一部叙事性非常强的线性电影游戏，你在玩的同时，能看到人性在各种环境下的变化和意志的顽强无畏……以及面对混沌似虚似实诱惑下的顽强和坚韧……

Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II, is an alien murder machine simulator developed by Saber Interactive and published by those guys that made their fortune making cycling simulators.

On the planet Kedaku, a Deathwatch Killteam is sent in to deploy a virus bomb to, at the very least, slow down the Tyranid hordes ravaging the planet. Demetrian Titus, former Ultramarine and current Ordos Xenos clean up crew member, is heavily injured after a battle with a Carnifex. He is saved, however, by his former Chapter, and Titus is reinstated as Lieutenant of the Ultramarine’s 2nd Company.
Also, his Killteam all died. They seemed nice.

Now, having undergone the Rubicon procedure, Titus is now one of those Space Marines that are taller than normal Space Marines, but their armor isn’t as cool so it always kind of feels wrong. He, along with squad members Chairon and Gadriel (not to be confused with that elf lady from The Lord of the Rings: Galadriel), Titus does battle with the Tyranid swarms as he and his men discover now and terrible secrets in a star system at war.

Some people waited thirteen years for this game, I was one of them. Space Marine II is practically a continuation of the first game with some new and cool features added on. No longer being restrained on the 360 and PS3, Space Marine II does a great job actually capturing the scale and numbers of a Tyranid invasion of a planet.

Space Marine II, like the first one, is a third person shooter revolving around shooting aliens in the face and then tearing them apart with whatever beating stick you have on hand. There are a variety of weapons to choose from such as, the Bolt rifle, the other Bolt Rifle, the longer bolt rifle, the bolt rifle but with a better scope, the one that shoots plasma, the melta gun that feels like you’re pushing your hand through a ball of wet socks when you use it. And also a bunch of melee weapons like: The knife the side of my entire body, a chainsword so I can stab you while I’m stabbing you, the power sword which is like a regular sword but also cuts thing gooder, and the big hammer you use because your message wasn’t clear enough when the chainsword was being used.

Its a neat mix of Gears of War shooting and hack and slash action. Dumping an entire magazine of bolt rounds into a swarm of Tyranids and then laying into them with whatever melee weapon you have on hand is the bread and butter of the game play, and its a pretty good bread and butter. Its like the first game where you turn grots and Orks into Swiss cheese, but now theres a ♥♥♥♥ ton more Tyranids than there were Orks in the first game, and slicing through them in swathes is basically dopamine injected straight into my brain.

There are also larger, angrier, hornier Tyranids that accompany the swarms. Warriors are the most common, but you do occasionally have to deal with other variants like the Lictor, a stealthy bastard, and the Carniex, a big bastard.
Zoanthropes are there too, but who cares.

Mission variety is mostly just trying to stem the tide of alien bugs, either by blowing them up good or deploying something that upsets them. But there’s some intrigue in the story, enough to keep you hooked with the plot, like a big reveal that I can’t mention.

Chaos is there, Tzeentch flavored this time. That’s not a spoiler, they’re in the promotional material. That’s not the big reveal, though.

Outside of the story mode, you also have two multiplayer modes to keep you coming back. Operations is a 3 player Co-Op mode where you and two of your Space Marine pals do stuff that helps Titus and the 2nd Company, as well as the Cadian 8th and any other Imperial butt hole in the system, deal with the invaders and send them packing. Its an interesting mode, almost reminds me of Left 4 Dead sometimes, its really fun to play, just make sure you have 2 other pals to play with or else an NPC follows you around and that’s lame.

The OTHER other mode is PVP, the Eternal War is an 8 vs 8 man murder mode where the Primaris Astartes do battle with the Heretic Astartes, the Chaos Space Marines, the LEGIONES TRAITORIS.
You have several classes to pick from, the same ones you pick in Operations, and then go to town on one another, either trying to kill 50 of them before they kill 50 of you or holding objectives until the timer runs out or the meter fills up.

Its a goofy, fun, chaotic time, but its also frustrating at points. It feels like kind of an after thought in a way. And the name of the game seems to be grouping up and melting the other guys via focused fire before they can melt you. You can do some clever things every now and then with your class abilities, but it mostly comes down to who sees who first and who pulls the trigger faster.

I like the game a lot, solid 8/10 for me, there’s just some things that irk me the wrong way. A lot of the weapons feel undertuned. I feel like when a weapon is basically “The one you start with, but bigger.” it should feel like it. I think a Tyranid Warrior, the ranged ones, once took 20 some rounds of bolter to the face before even being stunned.
The Boltguns in general also feel weak, I mean that in a game feel kind of way, not in a balance way, it does have problems balance wise, but. The way it sounds just sounds weak to me.

The Bolter in the first game was mean, it sounded like someone was punching the side of a car door really hard. The Bolt Rifle however may as well be making a “pew pew” sound.

Also, please put more attention into the PVP. I don’t know exactly how to fix it, maybe new maps and random spawns or fine tune the weapon a bit better? It feels like an afterthought since it was in the first game, which it might have been.

Yeah I like it a lot.

Space Marine II does a good job in capturing that fantasy of being a giant, 8ft tall meat mountain murder machine in a messed up super future. Your steps are big and stompy, and everything you hit with any kind of weapon just turns into a fountain of blood. Tyranids coming at you in the hundreds and literally climbing over one another like a tidal wave to get up a wall is amazing to see.

Warhammer 40,000 is such a weird franchise to me, mostly just because of where it stands as a series. Its a tabletop War game with a lot of extended universe material like books, comics, and y’know, video games.

Having been a Necron Player for the last 20 years or so, because I like winning and Terminator kicks ass, I got to see the war game I love fluctuate and change, introducing new people, sometimes for the better, sometimes for the worse.

40K is the only War Game I know where a good chunk of the fanbase actively refuses to play it. Even a lot of the other material is -mostly- ignored in favor of just reading summaries on wikis around the internet. Warpath and Mutant Chronicles probably don’t have this problem, and you probably don’t even know what those are.
And if you do, hey! We should play sometime.

Its a series that people want to change, mostly for the worse. Its also a series that people are way too invested in, and not even from a financial point of view. This endless war on the internet about what 40k should and shouldn’t be is, hilariously enough, sort of indicative of the franchise as a whole. An endless battle between people that don’t actually want a common ground, they just want to be in charge.

Its still very near and dear to my heart, but there’s probably going to come a time in the future where I might just have to move on. Mostly because of corporate ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥, but if my friends are all gone, I may as well go too.

我是一个锤粉 第一时间果断冲了豪华。看了预告本身就很期待了又看了试玩更期待了！等到现在终于开放了我从下载到安装 突破傻逼 epic和亚空间服务器等重重困难九九八十一难第一时间把剧情打完。感觉有点失望 ，只能说不愧是你们做的游戏 优点和缺点跟僵尸世界大战基本一样内容太少了。但有一点不一样，战锤40k的世界观体量就做这么点东西让我有一种花了399买了个dlc的感觉。也就多人任务可以玩一玩但是就六张图打不了多久。只能说未来可期。
下面是我个人的一些意见，虽然感觉这个游戏开发出来还是像一个半成品 但是这个平台的潜力还是有。40k世界那么大体量 这种坦克装甲车载具 终结者 无畏 各种型号的骑士和泰坦 都是游戏内容等着你们开发 各个战团的皮肤不卖到手抽筋吗。我看评论里也有建议搞一个多人的战场模式 把这些内容投进去 在线玩家肯定爆满。战场模式游戏平衡做好做好还会有一批长期的玩家 。战锤世界那么多种族够开发到天荒地老海枯石烂的。我相信除了忠诚玩家和混沌四神的信徒以外还有一大批玩家想要和搞毛二哥一起体验大waaaag的神奇 战斗就是爽！ 想像利卡特一样杀人于无形 和武士虫一样砍sm如同砍瓜切菜 大吞噬者饿了就是吃。想遵循上上善道的旨意征服宇宙 又或者刚起床就发现家被机械教给挖穿了的太空死灵等等，要知道锤友可不只有忠诚派 各个种族势力的玩家都有。还可以开发一个单挑模式或者战旗模式打打排位等等—
另外 不是锤粉的路人玩家还是建议在蹲蹲看 等打折了在入手。

Game is the embodiment of too much hype

Cons
-Comes out with DLC already being advertised
-Poor servers that lag (even during single player)
-Single player story is around 8h on hardest difficulty
-PvP mode is bare bones with painfully slow progression that locks any real customisation with high levels (not to mention you can only customise your look half the time as you're forced to wear heretic armour during half the matches which you can't customise)
-Loading screens on loading screens on loading screens (You might think I'm exaggerating to emphasise but you will have to do a loading screen to go into another loading screen for all multiplayer modes)

Pros
-Looks cool, visuals are really nice
-Its warhammer 40k

Do not buy on full price wait for a sale.

I personally do not understand why they haven't fleshed things out and opted for purchasable cosmetic route rather than half releasing the game with a DLC promised on launch.

If anyone is willing to buy cosmetics its warhammer 40k fans.

WARHAMMER 40K SPACE MARINE 2 TÜRKÇE İNCELEME: AKSİYON DOLU OYUN!
Warhammer 40000 Space Marine 2 inceleme videosuyla karşınızdayım, iyi seyirler!
YouTube™ Video: AKSİYONUN KAN OLUP AKTIĞI OYUN: WARHAMMER 40K SPACE MARINE 2! 
Views: 6,325

J'adore l'univers de Warhammer 40K, j'avais adoré le premier opus et les premières previews de ce Space Marine 2 étaient dithyrambiques alors j'ai foncé : précommande, ultra édition collector etc...

Et au final, après 8 h de jeu : un gros "mouais"...

Oui, le lore est fidèle, oui, c'est ultra bourrin, oui, c'est joli mais... c'est tout.

À côté de ça, le jeu est pas super bien optimisé sur PC, c'est lourd et confus à manier, très répétitif, le PVP est bien faible côté contenu et finitions, les menus sont pénibles et le tout manque cruellement de QoL... Et puis, ce choix d'avoir mis les Tyrannides en ennemi principal, quelle erreur : on est finalement plus dans un BTA au corps-à-corps qu'un vrai jeu de shoot (comparé à Space Marine 1 où l'on affrontait des orks).

Du coup, oubliez toute notion de précision ou de headshots : les engagements sont toujours les mêmes avec des hordes de bestioles grouillantes qui vous foncent dessus, on balance deux, trois bastos à distance pour dégarnir les premiers rangs mais comme les ennemis sont de toute façon trop nombreux et rapides, que les tyrannides "supérieurs" sont trop résistants (et que l'on est vite à court de munitions en plus du rechargement qui prend une plombe), ça finit invariablement par défourailler à l'épée tronçonneuse avec quelques parades/esquives pas hyper intuitives.

Alors, c'est très fidèle au lore, hein. Mais c'est plat et redondant.

Et pourtant, j'ai envie d'aimer ce jeu, j'adore l'univers et tout mais au final c'est un peu la douche froide. Je lis les avis ici et là qui parlent du jeu de l'année, d'un shooter épique etc... et je me demande si on joue bien au même jeu : Space Marine 2 n'est pas une bouse mais clairement ça ne vaut pas tous les superlatifs qu'on entend sur lui et ça ne vaut pas 60 € non plus (et encore moins le prix en collector mais bon voilà, je me suis fait avoir, c'est la vie).



La campagne :
+ Agréable avec quelques moments de bravoure bien sentis
+ Un poil courte mais ça reste convenable

- Zéro envie de la refaire une fois terminée

Le mode opérations :
+ Concept sympa qui reprend des passages de la campagne mais sous un angle différent
+ Système d'upgrade et d'arbre de talent sympa
+ Les différentes classes bien fichues et leur gameplay qui change un peu

- Un poil répétitif quand on monte plusieurs persos Lv 25
- Parer comme un dieu pendant 25 min, avoir 3 secondes d'inattention et se faire ouvrir en deux en niveau Ruthless, quel plaisir
- Les erreurs de connexion serveur trop fréquentes, c'est vraiment pas sérieux

Le PVP:
+ Simple et efficace, à l'ancienne
+ Accessible à tous (hitboxes énormes, pas de saut hors classe Assaut, Pas de glissade/couvert, 3 maps à retenir...)
+ Légère composante MOBA/Hero shooter sympa
+ Toutes les classes apportent un truc

- Matchmaking débile qui met systématiquement les plus gros Lv ensemble VS les Lv 3
- On peut passer 2 jours à ne pouvoir jouer que les Space Marine du chaos qui sont visuellement HORRIBLES/low poly/pas customizables (genre relancer le matchmaking entre chaque game et quand même finir côté Chaos, j'ai jamais vu un truc pareil...)
- Les gens qui se font farmer alors que le PVP est simplissime, les Tactical qui ne scannent jamais les ennemis, les coéquipiers qui regardent la zone mais qui ne vont pas dessus, ça rend fou (même si c'est pas la faute du jeu)
- Les respawns : un coup, c'est 3 secondes, un coup, c'est 8 secondes, au pif...

Au final, et avec les patchs, le jeu s'améliore doucement mais son état actuel fait que c'est avant tout un jeu pour les fans de la licence.
Jogo muito bom, infelizmente não vale peço cheio, ainda falta muito conteúdo da história, acaba sem mais nem menos, justamente quando tá ficando bom, 8/10.

제일로 문제인 전우조 시스템 생겨서 몇몇 클래스가 특색이 사라짐.
어썰트는 지면강타로 위협이 되는 마요리스를 제거하거나 잡몸을 제거하는 용돈데 치명적 난이도에서는
그 짓거리 하다간 처형을 해도 쉴드도 못채우고 뒤지기 쉽상임 뱅가드도 마찬가지고 스나이퍼도 마찬가지임

무한공세에 그냥 뚜드려 맞고 죽어야함. 너프만하다 망한 옆집 그대로 따라가고 있음
요번 패치 이후로 능동적으로 했던 플레이 방식이 수동적으로 되었고
치명적 난이도는 해금되는 스킨을 얻으면 전혀 할 메리트가 현재 없어보인다고 생각한다.
제일 어려운 난이도를 깼을때 성취감,만족감 보다는 그냥 불쾌하고 스트레스만 받는다

I've already gotten to play a quite a bit as I received early review access for my podcast, so I can confidently say this game is worth the time of any Warhammer fan. Saber did a fantastic job capturing the spirit of 40k - the setting, story, sound design, and overall atmosphere are all very well done with an emphasis on attention to detail. Plus they simply nailed both the look and the intensity of "the swarm" (much better than Aliens: Fireteam Elite, Helldivers, or even Doom).

Likewise, the combat never gets boring, as you chain endless combos of guns and melee into satisfying executions. The campaign is solid and can be played solo or co-op. The operations mode (which plays a bit more like Vermintide or Darktide missions) has endless ways to customize your character - both with gameplay perks and weapon upgrades, but also a nice cosmetic progression system. There are also class trials to hone your skills and try out the various flavor of marine that best suits your tastes.

I'm looking forward to checking out Eternal War (the PvP mode) now that the game has launched to the general public. All in all it's just a fun game you should get together with the boys and play (or just ride a bunch of cool elevators together, there are a lot in this game).

Note: The 21:9 support wasn't in when I tried it yet, so hoping that comes in the Day 1 patch, as well as a fov slider. I know you want us to feel like big hulking dudes right in the mix, but letting us pull out JUST a little bit might be good so I can see more of the big beautiful world of Warhammer.

I cannot fathom in any way shape or form that Focus would decide that the game is entirely too easy. It comes as a very odd notion when you are constantly fighting an uphill battle for Armory Data, to become stronger, to make things easier. The entire premise of the games progression for operations was to complete operations, become stronger, and steamroll. What is the purpose of the entire progression system if the devs want to pull the rug out from beneath you? There genuinely isn't a good reason to have the entire progression system there in order to become stronger, just for the developers to decide that it's "too easy" and nerf everything. Genuinely the only people this system hurts is newer, non maxed out players. Because everyone with the maxed out weapons, perk trees, and levels already have the experience required to interchange their loadouts to make the game easier. It appalls me that a powerfantasy PVE game didn't see how these changes ruined Helldivers to a nigh irreparable state. Nerfing the Melta bomb, by SEVENTY PERCENT against the one boss people like saving it for? Ridiculous. Sure, some people on Youtube made it one-shot the Hive Tyrant. That doesn't mean that everyone plays like that. The fun thing about Space Marine 2 is build variety, and the more you nerf certain things the more that is taken away. To return to my former statement about Helldivers, that exact thing is what killed the game for me. I can't enjoy the game where I feel pressured to play the exact same way as everyone else because that is manageable and the way I like playing isn't. The game hasn't reached that point yet, thankfully. But this patch is a clear tell in that direction.

Отрицательный, так как игра тупо не может законектится с серваками. Просто постоянно разрыв соединения, хотя раньше играл без проблем. Вышло новое ДЛС с новой операцией, которая не запускается. После вылета с баржи и сцены с космодесантниками игра показывает черный экран.

I don't really want to leave a negative review, the game really is good. But as a solo player going through the campaign on the recommended (albeit second hardest) difficulty, this game feels absolutely terrible to play. You have the two worst AI squad mates I have ever had the displeasure to call battle brothers, with the most useless and unforgiving "armor" system imaginable. Is it playable? Absolutely. Is it gratifying in difficulty to carry the bots through every mission while they exist only to throw some mostly ineffective bullets around and revive you (which will occur often)? No.

I do not even feel good getting better at the game sometimes, because it feels like I am competing against the actual combat system more than the enemies. So much of this game is made to be a flowing combat experience of dodging, slashing, and parrying, but often it just isn't. You get stuck in animations. You get notifiers of enemy attacks only like 1/3rd of the time. You get rewarded for parrying and playing it slow, but that just isn't effective when you're also getting swarmed by mooks that CHEW through you if you aren't constantly swinging, which paired with the aforementioned stuck in animations makes you take SO much unnecessary damage. Damage you barely heal from without wasting your ultimate with a lengthy cooldown, or frivolously utilizing the very scant med packs.

Rant aside, the game is genuinely good when it's good and when playing with actual people it's even better. Which is lucky considering the PvE and PvP are the main long term focus of the game. But as a solo player just enjoying the story at present, it is one of the worst experiences I have had playing a campaign.

Finalmente un gioco che al lancio è stabile, con contenuti e senza particolari bug che ne rovinano l'esperienza. Ho finito da poco la campagna, perfettamente in stile Warhammer, senza particolarissimi colpi di scena e molto lineare ma godibile da subito. Gameplay semplice ma rifinito e che da soddisfazioni. La modalità PvP è uguale, semplice ma che riesce a coinvolgere, non è troppo impegnativa ma se avete una squadra, potete togliervi soddisfazioni a livello tattico. Graficamente molto bello e devo dire, ottimizzato anche bene. GPU e CPU non vanno in ebollizione, tutto gira bene. Ripeto, erano anni che non si vedeva un gioco al day one senza problemi, un prodotto FINITO. Non la solita uscita che si rivela un mezzo casino tra server e ottimizzazione per poi scoprire che mancano pezzi, bisogna aspettare DLC e quanto altro. Io lo consiglio vivamente.

NOTA DOLENTE:

La campagna non ha matchmaking purtroppo quindi o avete un amico/a (che vi consiglio assolutamente, è molto più divertente) oppure vi dovrete affidare ai bot che purtroppo, sono tutto fuorché intelligenti e in alcuni momenti, c'è proprio da bestemmiare perché non riescono a dare priorità a nemici pericolosi e purtroppo vi capiterà di morire malissimo anche un po' per colpa loro.

MINI TIP PER LA CAMPAGNA E PER LE OPERAZIONE (PVE):

In giro per la mappa, troverete delle casse VERDI con l'icona di una spada o qualcosa del genere, bene: DISTRUGGETELE, perché all'interno troverete colpi, stimolanti e a volte anche upgrade temporanei all'armatura. Sembra una cavolata ma quando l'ho casualmente scoperto, è stata una bella salvata a livelli alti con i bot; sopratutto per gli stimolanti.

PER L'IMPERATORE!
este juego es la polla, no habia uno asi desde la trilogia de Gears Of War , solo botas en el suelo y camaraderia + honor sangre y muerte, recomentdado

本来更新完对这个游戏的评价应该是上涨的，因为制作组确实修改到了几个痛点机制改善了游戏体验，但是糟糕网络问题还是让我红温了。

游戏开始之后对网络稳定性的要求极高，轻微的一点网络波动马上就掉线，没有任何缓冲的余地。
你可能看着身边队友根本没有丢包的动作，突如其来地断开连接。

而制作组根本没有做对应补偿，只要一掉线马上踢出对局，之前所有的努力全部白费，你不会获得任何半程的经验，不会有哪怕一个武器数据。跟人开黑还好，能通过好友列表加回去，野队的话这个对局大概率跟你无关了。

在经历的一个小时内重复四次关底掉线，彻头彻尾的白忙活之后，我除了关掉游戏骂一句肏你妈之外还能干嘛？因为它们真的什么什么都没给我。

Greetings dear friends, the first thing that should be said in the review of this game is its charismatic and heavy atmosphere, which introduces you very nicely to the environment and mood of war-torn areas. The artistic design of the stages and environments is done in the best way. The story of the game is in a good position, but it could have made your mind more involved by adding more and varied complications. But it ends in the best way. And the main pillar of the game is its gameplay. The variety of weapons and equipment for Destroying the new attackers is very well done. The fight scenes are extremely epic. The finishers. The special effects and the sequences of facing the bosses of the game. This charm is maintained until the end of the game. Although I went through the story section with my friends, But the artificial intelligence of the game is also in a good condition if you want to play alone. The online part of the game is very well done and can keep you more entertained. The flaws that can be found in the game are that the story part could be longer and the character development. Let's see a better one, but the character of Titus himself is great.

One of most climatic WH40K games to date, the maps are gorgeous and the attention to detail is immense.
You can really immerse yourself in the gargantuan scale of Imperial architecture and brutalism of the game universe, all those character interactions and background behaviours are very true to the lore.

Campaign is really well written and very fun with companions.

Coop PVE Operations are bread and butter of the game that deliver a heroic struggle experience, there is quite a large variety of weapons and playstyles that one can achieve from customization.
Just screw meltas. :)

I have yet to go full out in PVP but seems decent, just matchmaking needs to be improved (i.e. so you don't have total team level difference of 25 vs 60).
Лучшая игра по вахраммеру, и одна из лучших за последнее время

无敌的单人剧情演出效果，想要成为帝皇最尖锐的剑和最坚固的盾吗，速速购买
当然联机模式马上让你体验战锤宇宙的黑暗，无限倒地，无限死亡，超级泰伦虫族。
What is your Duty? To serve Emperor's Will. What is Emperor's Will? That we fight and die. What is Death? It is our duty!
Игра просто замечательна,столько времени прошло с первой части и наконец дождались,очень надеюсь на продолжение
最好的战锤40K动作游戏！

Even though I haven’t spent many hours on Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 yet, it’s already clear that the shooting mechanics are satisfying, and the melee combat is a lotta fun. The game’s visuals are stunning, really bringing the warhammer universe to life. The campaign may be on the shorter side (around 8-10 hours) and somewhat average from what I've seen, but it’s still an enjoyable experience that's well worth playing through. Sometimes it may lag, but overall with its solid design and action, it’s definitely worth the full price for any fan of the series.

for me, while i do enjoy the game, its gonna be a Thumbs down.
i pretty much exclusively play the operations Mode, as i did the Hordemode in SM1.
and i do not like where the Patch Trend is going.

right now you require Armory Data (upgrade item) from Difficulty 3 and 4 if you wish to Upgrade your weapon and/or Advance the weapons Perktree.
so if you struggle on Dif. 2, you have to fight through an EVEN HARDER mission(Dif3) to upgrade your weapon to a point where you can enjoy Dif.2

the Perktree has the same issue, you need to unlock and max out each weapon in the Weaponclass to max out the Perks related tot he weapon. some of them completely altering attacks (Combat Knife) or adding additional Attacks (Thunder Hammer)
so to enjoy the weapon to the fullest you are forced to play a Dif you may not enjoy.

with Patch 3 they adjusted the Difficulty in a good way. Patch 3 made the Assault Class playable for non-sweaty people. i greatly appriciated that. but Patch for went in the other direction, including such sentences as "too easy" from the Devs.

that sounds like this game will not develop in a direction i will enjoy.
and until i see a different trajectory i will leave this as a "Not recommended" review.

i dont know why Developers seem to desperatly try to copy the Souls games.
Warhammer 40k is a Franchise about Powerfantasies. SM1 understood that.
im not here to Struggle, im here to Chant fanatical Phrases and shower in Digital Blood of my enemies.

who knows, maybe im just not the target audience.

As a casual player who was challenged (in a good way) by higher difficulties before the recent nerf, I just have to say that I cant remotely understand why the developer decided to make the game harder.

I understand that there are players who have mastered all difficulties and for those players, a new, higher difficulty was implemented. Why punish those players who were fine with the game as it was? I sincerely hope lessons were learned from Helldivers.

To those who react to what I said above by telling me to "get gud" or leave the game:
I am still learning and I know I have much to learn still. But as said, Im just a casual dude who plays some operations in the evening with friends and not the best player out there. I wonder who those balance changes are aimed at: the elite of the best players who are bored or a larger portion of the player base.

Theres no denying it: I am severely pissed off. Just got my first fencing weapon, played some really intense operations and barely made it, only to get the thing that made it possible get nerfed the next day.

Also, from consuming content very experienced players created, I understand that once you have perfected your parry timing, you go back to balanced weapons anyways because of their better stats. So the best of the best arent even affected by that change. Its rather kicking away the crutch of those who need it. Telling them to just keep dying until they have perfected their timing. Which does not sound like fun progression. In a cooperative game anyways.

Product refunded

爽，又没有完全爽。

爽的部分是画面，对于40K世界的视觉呈现足以喂饱IP粉丝。

没有完全爽的部分是玩法内核，我强烈怀疑开发者是不是有某种特殊XP，导致他们能做出如下的游戏特点：

1.喜欢看别人打炮，自己打手枪。嗯，大家看我都做出主战坦克和无畏的模型了，但是抱歉，玩家你只能看着他们开炮，看着大部队火拼。轮到你玩的时候，我善意的施舍了十几只虫子给你练练枪法，至于远处的虫潮和坦克大炮只是背景板。

2.要高潮了？给我憋回去！虽然一次只有十几只虫子给我练手，但有一说一，处决机制还是很爽的，尤其是当我一顿操作于乱军丛中锯人首级的时候。此时的我肾上腺素爆发，人甲合一，边喊着“还有谁？！”边寻找下一个目标血祭帝皇，可等待我的往往是一个长按E键开启后黑屏读盘的大门，或者一个长按E键等待十几秒升降的电梯。这该死的节奏控制，好比片中的老师刚喊一声雅蠛蝶，男主就真的停手提裤走人了。

爽，又没有完全爽。鉴于皇帝or鲁迅说过，忠诚不绝对就是绝对不忠诚，我给予本作差评。

"Get up, Tharius!" Titus shouted.
"My leg is gone, brother." said Tharius calmly while shooting enemies and been dragged away by his friend.

40k/10, would take revenge for Tharius' leg

截止到9.9，游戏时长30h，完整体验完了所有问题，包括服务器问题，小蓝熊问题，cpu温度问题，eos问题，epic无法连接问题。毕竟赤石多年，可以说上都不算特别大的问题，还能接受。你游最大的问题来源于自身——除了场景，其他能想象到的一切方面都很拉😢。毫无深度的动作系统，只有一把枪能用的武器平衡，首发的六张流程很短的地图，还有30h可以毕业三个职业的深度😓，令人感叹。如果你是愿意花300游玩7h战役的超级单机结晶锤粉，那我会推荐你玩，这游戏无与伦比、举世无双。如果你不是，快跑。
——来自小黑盒用户木桶的评价

Been loving the game ever since it came out but the new patch really ruined the game. It just doesn't feel fun anymore and there are some noticeable bump in scale of difficulty across the board. Unnecessary nerfing on weapons and equipment's also suck the joy out of this game. Let people have fun. Don't pull another Helldivers on us unless you want your goodwill to tanked like they do.

I was just playing a match that I hosted with two bots. Halfway through the mission a random player joins my lobby and moments later goes AFK before a checkpoint. "No big deal" I think after a minute of waiting "it's my lobby, I'll just vote to kick him and since it's just the two of us the vote will immediately pass". Nope, the game had given THEM ownership of the lobby I started and played half a mission in before they even showed up. I was literally a guest in a lobby I had started, a hostage to a host that had joined 15 minutes into the mission. Infuriating is the closest word I have for it that won't get profanity filtered.

Une campagne rapide mais efficace dans ce quelle propose sans prendre de risque mais tout en maîtrise. C'est foutrement beau et on se plait de temps à autre à profiter de la qualité du paysage entre deux coups d'épée tronçonneuse.

Une fois la campagne engloutie on se retrouve avec deux modes de jeu à notre disposition. N'ayant que joué à la partie PVE,je me limiterais uniquement à celle-ci.

C'est très complet, on peut très vite se retrouver aspiré dans la spirale d'enchaîner partie sur partie pour améliorer sa classe de Space Marine. A voir sur le long terme cependant car la boucle de gameplay est tout de même très répétitive et je ne suis pas sûr qu'augmenter uniquement le nombre de mission suffise à maintenir l'intérêt du titre.
Played a all nighter on the campaign because the Emperor demanded my service. I did not disappoint the lord as I slain all the heretic scum. For glory! For the Emperor!

Good: production values are through the roof, love the presentation, music, vo, anims, all fire stuff
Really Bad: playing solo campaign on veteran and can barely get through any set pieces without dying 100 times and is not skill issue. They did not play their own game to see that combat, while looking great, is derpy af

Will talk about it on core, i hope they see this or hear it, I really like this game but the combat makes it hard to love. will edit review and switch to thumbs up once combat is fixed but I'm super tilted by the sloppy combat in this game.

1) getting pummeled at range while having no cover sucks and we’re no dodge ninjas. Range damage should be hella lowered. I'm busy dealing with the problem in CQC. if they wanna pepper me while i'm in there -- fine. If they improve the health return mechanic maybe its less of an issue, but its just not fun getting peppered relentlessly while I'm in a scrum. I realize it maybe more realistic, but is video game who cares.

2) parry need to cancel current action and take priority over all other moves (except executes aka glory kills), and it needs to be generous with direction and timing. We have hoards of dudes crawling into our butts. It may not be realistic but it feels good video game wise — doom 2016 and eternal does this super well with glory kills. Doesn’t matter if I’m reloading or scratching my nuts I press glory kill and I glory kill. Executes already does this in game, parries should do this as well

3) I find myself parrying even if there is no blue circle. Let parries just work — like Arkham games. the number of times a sword guy does an non-blue non-red attack and I parry only for the game to derp and I get hit anyway is massively aggravating. I could have been spamming attack, but when I spam attack, there's a blue circle and I'm in an attack anim and can't parry. This isn't some fighting game where misreads are punished. Let the players parry. The animations looks sick for it I want to spam the parry-gun shot follow up all freakin day man.

4) The game only lets you self heal on glory kill when you have white health. White health lasts like 0.000001 seconds. Get rid of white health, it's dumb. All executes should just self heal. This will let us tank the range damage we're getting pummelled by when we are in a melee scrum. Medkits can then and should be saved for ranged encounters (where executes aren't available).

5) Armor is weird and makes little sense. Make it one bar or just get rid of it. I don't remember needing it in SM1 and I'm not even sure what is does except go away quickly and never come back.

6) mission set pieces seem to be designed for 3 players… a) set piece mechanic b) hordes of melee c) ranged minions. In solo, I can’t use 3 different weapons at the same time. Example is the rat fight -- I can't shoot the flame thrower, the ranged drones, and the damn sword guys all at the same time. The moment I swap to plasma gun/sword the rat turbines trip me on to the ground and do 1000000 damage. like did you need play these missions solo and go "man sure seems like some cheap ♥♥♥♥ players will love this"

7) exacerbating this problem is the number of times I see ai teammates just standing there, or take a few pot shots at a baby tyrannid while a set piece mission objective is going up in smoke made me put down the game. Again, during rat missions there are drones that need to be taken out, and rats to keep at bay. Since the AI can't be bothered to use the flamethrower, I gotta keep rats at bay. What are my AI buddies doing? Shooting rats. Either make them be more effective at helping or make the set piece stuff make sense for solo play.

I actually love a lot about this game and want to play it more but combat and poor combat encounter design leaves too much to be desired right now and the game is frustrating.
主线老兵难度+pve正常难度一遍玩了快30个小时，其中热熔武器就用了20个小时，武器强度真的一边倒

Enjoyed my time with a lot, a ton of fun for fans of 40k and those getting into the setting. Don't think it's an absolute requirement to play the 1st game (although you should).

有一说一，性价比是真低，因为游戏内容太少和pvp太抽象了，但和好友一齐玩pve还是有意思的，大家一齐赎罪远征。至于随机匹配有时候也会匹配到有趣的人，带萌新的感觉也挺有意思的，但国人还是少。至于像服务器不稳定和穿图等这些缺点，我开加速器还是挺稳定的，但偶尔还会突然掉线，除此外我还遇到过有人进来然后又突然退出去，倒计时直接消失了，我们开不了游戏，房主退了重开才可以开游戏。最让我难受的，还是盾兵的盾弹反一堆bug，反正现在职业就一小丑，抗也抗不住，输出也难说，毕竟这游戏怪海多，盾和没有一样，也就大招有用，当然也可能我练的第一个职业是盾兵让我坐牢导致的怨念，让我觉得盾兵除了帅好像就大招有用。穿图的话，我遇到过两次，但都是整活哥干的。总之。目前为止，pve的血与火还是让我刷的很爽的，但pvp能不能删了啊，pvp一点乐趣都体验不到，可能是我还不是百年老兵的原因，等我满100个小时后我还会再评。

Пройден сигнл на предпоследней сложности.
Геймплей - ну тут все понятно, привет 2010 год, есть точка А, есть точка Б. Задача добраться. По пути есть мерзкие ксеносы (тираниды) и чертовы предатели (отребье из 1000 сынов). Пушки и патроны разбросаны в достатке. Аптечек мало. Режим, пилим, сжигаем все противников Императора. Однообразно? Пожалуй да, но зрелищно.
Графика- хорошо, сочно, красиво. Анимации ближнего боя замечательны.
Сюжет - по началу между главным героем и его напарниками есть недоверие, которое исчезает ближе к середине игры. Основной сюжет вобщем-то неплох для игровой экранизации Вахи.
Сеттинг - гримдарк, пафос, бесконечная война, все по канону.
Звук- отличный, порадовала русская речь.
Хотелось бы сказать о напарниках - тупы как пробки.
Вобщем-то хороший проект, чтобы отвлечься и уничтожить врагов Человечества.
В случае игры в коопе отзыв будет дополнен.

La campaña es 10/10. Entras en el papel de Demtrian Titus, un space marine primaris... y eso es todo lo necesario para completar la campaña. Nada de builds, nada de talentos, nada de subir de nivel, nada de mejorar armas. Todas las armas sirven para cumplir la voluntad del emperador, aunque sí es posible utilizar diferentes tipos de armas durante las misiones.

Hay algunas misiones secundarias que complementan la historia principal y se pueden hacer en multijugador, o se pueden hacer completamente solo si eres como yo y no tienes con quién jugar este gran juego.

Solo espero que en el futuro agreguen más misiones secundarias, o un DLC que extienda la campaña principal.

Product received for free

Simplemente hermoso, ahora que te resumí el juego en dos palabras hoy aprenderemos a hacer tortitas:

Ingredientes:
.-1 vaso leche
.-1 vaso harina
.-1 cucharada aceite de oliva virgen
.-1 cucharada generosa levadura Royal
.-1 poquito sal
.-1 cada azúcar avainillado
.-1 huevo

Pasos:

Paso 1
Batir muy bien el huevo. Yo batí primero la clara y luego la yema.
Paso 2
Añadir todos los ingredientes en el bol y seguir batiendo sin parar. La masa irá cogiendo fuerza y se hará espesa.
Paso 3
Ponemos el bol con papel film y metemos 5 - 10 minutos en el congelador para no tener que dejar la masa reposando para que luego salgan esponjosas.
Paso 4
Mientras preparamos la sartén, el plato y la mantequilla.
Paso 5
Sacamos la masa. Pasamos un poco de mantequilla por la sartén con papel de cocina. Echamos una cucharada grande de masa en la sartén.
Paso 6
Esparcimos la masa hasta el tamaño que nos gusten (las tortitas).
Paso 7
Le damos la vuelta a la tortita, se dora por el otro lado y… Al plato.
Paso 8
Hacemos esto cada vez hasta que nos quedemos sin masa.

Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2

Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 to gra Akcji stworzona przez Studio Saber Interactive .
W grze sterujemy Kapitanem Titusem członkiem zakonu Ultramarines który był również główną postacią w Space Marine 1.
W Space Marine 2 gramy 200 lat po Wydarzeniach Pierwszej części.
System walki jest świetnie zrobiony, podczas Wojny z potworami będziemy korzystać z Pistoletów, Karabinów jak i Mieczy Łańcuchowych lub Noży.
Bronie mają mało Amunicji więc podczas walki Dynamicznie zmieniamy jak walczymy, czasem walczymy z Odległości a 5 sekund później przecinamy naszych wrogów Mieczem.
Gra posiada 3 Tryby: Kampania, Operacje i Wieczna Wojna .
W Kampanie możemy grać Solo lub w Co-Op'ie z dwoma znajomymi, tak samo jest w Operacjach możemy w nie grać Samemu lub w Co-Op'ie.
Tryb to tryb PvP w którym mamy 3 typy meczy: Przejęcie Terenu, Przejęcie i Kontrola i Anihilacja.
Podczas gry Online do wyboru mamy 6 Różnych klas postaci które różnią się Bronią którą walczą jak i Umiejętnościami Specjalnymi.
Klasy do wyboru to czyli każdy znajdzie coś dla siebie od Walki na Odległość Snajperem po walkę w Zwarciu Ostoją.
Co muszę również pochwalić w tej Grze to Oprawa Graficzna i Krajobrazy, wszystko jest pięknie zrobione i daje nam ten Feeling świata Warhammer'a.
Co mnie również cieszy jest to że Wersja 1.0 gry jest Bardzo Dobrze Dopracowana i nie mamy tutaj takich problemów jak przy wielu innych nowych grach.
Jak dla mnie gra jest Świetna, napewno bede dużo w nią grał i czekał na Kolejne Update'y ponieważ Roadmap na Kolejne 2 Lata wygląda Super.

Zapraszam również na Mój Filmik w Którym Pokazuję tą Grę:

Как человек, который по работе пишет на SSL [Saber Script Language] игру я конечно порекоммендую)
Но только фанатам вахи. Если вы не знаете, кто такие космические десантники, то ждите скидку.
Плюсы:
+ Визуал [Весь. Окружение, проработка уровней, стиль противников скриптовые сцены, например, с падающим колоколом - все это выглядит круто. Но судя по потерям и финальным сценам - сильно больше роты на корабле катается. И почему капитан Акеран щеголяет не в грависе, а в фобос арморе, даже при высадке на планету с тяжелым сопротивлением - загадка. Хотя, новый канон - это новый канон. Верните Като Сикариуса, настоящего капитана 2 роты ультрамаринов!]
+ Пафос [Ты играешь за сверхчеловека! Где-то один усатый дядя перевернулся в гробу от восторга. А сцена с обороной горки от соседских пацанов - топ эпик. Добивания врагов - сочные, ты реально руками разрываешь всяких ксеносов]

На этом плюсы наверное и заканчиваются, начинаются минусы:
- Отвратительное управление. Первые 2 часа я пытался играть на стандартном управлении, в итоге плюнул на это дело и поменял почти все хоткеи на другие. Лучше не стало. Игра заставляет тебя использовать рукопашный бой, но для удара у тебя всего 1 кнопка, для парирования и блока также одна кнопка. Ну и перекат, куда без него, тоже 1 кнопка. Прерывание анимаций как-бы есть, но не во всех последовательностях. Иногда ты слишком рано нажал парирование, и получаешь за это по лицу. Иногда ты лишний раз ударил, уже не можешь отменить анимацию атаки, и получаешь по лицу. То есть отзывчивости в управлении нет [как, например, в верме, дарктайде или дип коке, где в любой момент ты можешь свапнуть оружие, поставить блок, прервав свою атаку и так далее].
Ну ладно, допустим ты ошибся и получил в лицо один удар, да? Да ведь, игра, я получу ОДИН удар за свою ошибку?! Нет, игра считает, что если ты получил удар, то тебя надо ввести в состояние стаггера, в котором тебя продолжают бить, продлевая твой стаггер. То есть 1 пропущенный удар в толпе вполне может закончиться твоим падением на пузико и криками: "Братик, я упал, подними меня".
Кто-то может сказать: "Ну, не получай удары". Но Я считаю, что подобное управление в 2024 - это просто издевательство, я вроде не в азиатский соулслайк играю, чтобы меня за одну невовремя нажатую кнопку клали.
Отсюда вылезает вторая проблема:
- Баланс в пве. То есть тебе почти нет смысла драться в мили, проще постоянно перекатываться и изредка между перекатами делать выстрел. А что умеет делать сильный выстрел между перекатами? Мельта! При этом она имеет талант, который позволяет вернуть хп, которое было у игрока секундой ранее. Но также она чуть-чуть хилит, если она прокачена. Точнее по задумке чуть-чуть, а по факту: если тебя ударили и пробили твое хп до нуля, то один выстрел из мельты в толу вернет все твое здоровье. И это не белое здоровье из вермы, которое со временем уйдет. Это вечное здоровье.
Играть с болтерами после этого нет никакого смысла. Ибо даже если убрать отхил у мельты, она все равно за 1 выстрел способна сжечь толпу, в то время как из болтера даже хурму или термагантов вы будете расстреливать обоймами. Про элиту даже молчу, не смешно, реально резиновые пульки для разгона тиранидов.
- Мало карт как для пве, так и для пвп. 3 карты для пвп - это смешно. Просто приедается. 6 операций для коопа, вроде бы неплохо, но они не сбалансированы по времени и сложности. Есть легчайшая инферно, которую можно соло с ботами проходить за 20 минут и остальные 5 карт по часу, которые вы пройдете 1 раз для галочки и может быть перепройдете другу тоже для галочки или покекать. И все. От инферно начинает тошнить примерно после 10 перепрохождений. А предстоит их вам много.
- Прокачка. 6 классов, оружия маловато, болтеры по сути ничем не отличаются друг от друга. Стандартное дерево перков, выбери 1 из трех, и так 8 раз. Никаких престижей, докачал персонажа до 25 лвла - теперь выфармливай скины. На максимальные скины нужно около 35-40 игр, зависит от класса, кому-то побольше, кому-то поменьше. Докачал скины - можешь выкидывать персонажа и брать другого. На оружии тоже есть прокачка, в виде дерева. Пока оружие серое - оно вообще не стреляет. Когда становится рыжим - начинает стрелять резиновыми пульками как в глоке. Ну кроме мельты, она даже серая что-то может. В текущих реалиях нет смысла качать что-то кроме мельты, надеюсь, это исправят, причем, не понерфив мельту, а усилив болтеры. Иначе будет грустно расстреливать губки для урона [Точнее просто перекатываться никого не убивая]. Я конечно не ждал глубокой системы прокачки, но получилось вообще максимально стандартно.
- Сюжет. Нет, я понимаю, что когда люди смотрят марвел, то они не ждут сюжета, а просто смотрят на приятную картинку. Когда люди играют в см, они просто играют за космоморяка на пафосе. Но сюжет тут реально вторичен. Отдельное внимание хочется уделить диалогам. Точнее хотелось бы, чтобы это внимание диалогам уделили, но не получилось. Диалоги с Титом в компании проработаны хорошо. Но вот все второстепенные диалоги можно смело заменить на тишину. И будет даже лучше. Ну то есть диалоги уровня: "Братик, спасибо, что направляешь мой прицел, что бы я без тебя делал". "Да, я такой". "Не зазнавайся". Они вообще спейсмарины, элита элит империума на спецзадании, от которого зависит судьба этого мира [планеты] или тинейджеры, которые вышли на прогулку за хлебом? Интересно, что там кодекс ультрам говорит про бесконечный ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ не по делу и забивание эфира своими помехами?
А про срывающие башни у ультрамаринов - это вообще отдельная песня. Они как бы не кровавые ангелы и не космические волки, у которых от вида битвы может сорвать крышу, и они войдут в рейдж. Они должны быть образцом спокойствия, а не психующими мальчиками. Они должны быть молчаливы и лаконичны, а не болтать в объеме этого обзора. Тем более, что один из напарников - сержант. Кто-то может прочитать ваховику, и сказать, что это же 2 рота, они всегда бросаются в бой там, где другие бы отступили. И я соглашусь, предложив прочитать им на абзац ниже, где сказано, что они так делают не потому, что безрассудны, а потому что уверены в своем превосходстве и своей подготовке. А не прыгнуть в толпу гаргуш и хурмы, потерять пистолет и почти умереть смертью глупых. Постоянно спорить со своим лейтенантом и пытаться его застрелить. В общем, понятно, почему Тит ходит таким хмурым. Я бы на его месте тоже предпочел взвод кадианцев, а не двух болванов-младенцев, за которыми нужно следить как за детьми, параллельно спасая планету.
В общем, замени космодесант на любой другой сеттинг - ничего не изменится в этой игре.
- Наверное, самый главный минус этой игры - технический. Это сетевое соединение. Постоянные реконнекты, с выгрузкой/загрузкой на баржу, 140 ошибка, вечный загрузочный экран - все это очень больно видеть. Особенно бесит сетевой код в пвп, где ты уходишь за стенку, а через секунду умираешь, так как пинг тебя догоняет.

Итог: игра неплохая, кампания реально зашла, пафос вывозит большую часть несостыковок. Да и закрываешь глаза на многое как фанат вахи. Тем более, что по вахе нормального уже давно ничего не выходило. Я бы дождался фикса технических проблем, возможно, фикса баланса. И если баланс пофиксят в нужную сторону, то смело можно брать. А там глядишь и скидка подъедет

Fun game play in the PVE but PVP has a bit of delay in lag like dying late. On another note If you cancel an operation you have to either leave barge or back out to title screen to get back in queue as if you directly try to start another operation it wont load people most of the time. But other than that fun dynamics although does need a healing/apothecary class for PVE or the option to heal a teammate. nothing like you having 2 stims and full health while your teammate is at deaths door and you cant help them out.

Game is fun, exceptionally so.
Thankfully the devs are walking back on trying to balance the game vastly into the ruinous power's favor. Still plagued with numerous issues from crashing, networking, matchmaking, and the like.

Some of the weakest weapons are receiving a small amount of attention, making it seem like they're not afraid of making the game too hard, but afraid of making it too fun.

Hopefully the perk systems are addressed, as a majority of the traits are either wrong to take against one of its competitors, or flat out not doing anything.

The worst part of the game is the class restricting matchmaking, tossing you into games where you possibly cannot play 2 of the classes, with no way to ensure you end up playing what you want, outside of maintaining a private lobby.

对于战锤粉丝来说可能算是相当不错的游戏？
实际应该也是近乎完全面向粉丝的作品= =
对于普通玩家来说比较蛋疼的点就不少了
总的来说还是可以玩的

首先世界观来讲……
个人完全不懂战锤世界观，
对于游戏里突然冒出的特殊名词都是一脸茫然，
游戏里也没有相应的解释或者百科全书之类的东西= =
这方面对于新玩家确实不太友好
不过可以直接理解成扮演一个全副武装的钢铁壮汉，
要去干翻波涛汹涌的外星怪物就好XD
也会有一些壮观的大场面
单纯喜欢这个风格的玩家倒是也可以只为此来玩
（就是作为全副武装的钢铁壮汉来说感觉也太纸防了一点……
单纯为了爽的话还是建议简单难度可能比较好）

至于剧情方面倒是挺直接的，
很典型欧美电影展开，反正主角是最正确的，
早听主角的要求就能解决问题没那么多事了的感觉。
然后黑叔叔偏正派，白人大背头队友让人不爽也很典。












游戏性方面只能说还过得去，
不同近战武器有不同的攻击模组，又有不少远程武器可供选择，处决也挺爽挺帅的。
再加上引导很好，也没什么蛋疼解密，不用担心卡关
战斗能接受的话基本上就是全程爽玩过去了。
（但是存档的位置比较奇葩……
在飞船上的时候最好是在最开始就进支线任务战役，
别主线对话到一半再去进，否则这一章节的主线只能从头开始）
其余就是一些BUG，莫名掉帧，敌人突然消失瞬移，程序突然卡死弹出啥的，
还有部分关卡，比如说那个需要用火焰喷射器的关卡玩起来特别难受，
火喷在敌人身上一点儿喷到的感觉都没有……
这些毛病会很影响体验，而且遇到的情况还不少。

然后就是音乐和音效方面，
这个个人觉得是真心不太行了……
音效本身其实还好，就是有时候该大的声音却不大，违和感有点强，
可是部分音乐经常包含些奇怪的鼓声钢铁声轰鸣声，会和战斗时的音效混杂在一起，
加上各种声音时大时小= =
就导致语音，音乐，音效三者各种大大小小的声音混在一起时，
经常会给人特别杂乱的感觉（也可能是我开的不是英配的缘故？）
是难得我甚至想因为声音体验扣分的游戏……
（但是打上头也不用在意这些毛病）

总之个人的整体评价是7分左右
如果是非常喜欢这个主题类型的玩家或者战锤粉应该能给到8分以上吧

O Universo de Warhammer 40k é por essência um conjunto de 'coisinhas', E essas são: Terror, Tragédia, Brutalidade, Pancadaria, Carnificina e por aí vai..(Já Deu pra Entender que os Fracos não tem chance e nem vez), que fazem dele um universo único. E essas 'coisinhas' são um lembrete curto e grosso, 'Não há Esperança e muito menos uma garantia de Paz'.

A excelente campanha é uma continuação direta do primeiro game, com uma trama muito boa e bem amarrada com as missões Co-op mostrando de outro ponto as missões lideradas por TITUS.
Aqui o Co-op brilha trazendo uma variedade de armas e classes de Space Marines para que possamos completar as missões, que podem ser jogadas solo ou com mais dois amigos (com amigos é melhor).
O multi-Jogador é a extensão do Co-op para um PvP BRUTAL com vários modos. Game 10/10.

Os DEV's de Space Marine 2 estão de parabéns e tenhamos MÁXIMO RESPEITO, foram literalmente na direção Contrária de outros, que vem tentando empurrar essas " Ideologias Mágicas" medonhas goela abaixo nos players, E Todos sabemos que Mágica é coisa de herege, E aqui apagamos o fogo da heresia na Paulada.

Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 


Для прокачки в ПвЕ слишком много гринда, будто это не пристройка, а основной режим игры.
